entry.title: Full Closet
entry.summary:
Author: Ivychankasumi

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,546Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 37

Summary: "Four, five, six..."Clark went through his closet a second time. He always did this at the beginning of the month, when his paycheck came in and he felt some relief in his pocket. While doing his duties as a superhero, it was normal that an incident would force him to leave a shirt or a coat lying around a building. Well, it used to be like that. It was strange, but for the past four months, it seemed that the number had not diminished. Fluff. Superbat. Kinda Domestic.

entry.title: The Protection Agreement
entry.summary:
Author: Nacrestack

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,911Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 40

Summary: Superman has finally had enough. It has been far too long for him to not reveal his identity. When he commits to outing himself to the JL he'll have to contend with the ever cautious Batman. Little does Clark know, Batman isn't nearly as opposed as he seems and Batman might have a secret of his own to share.Too bad everything goes wrong as soon as Batman starts to open up. First it's the media frenzy, then Batman's weird behavior, then Bruce Wayne's ridiculous antics and finally a dangerous villainous plot. Clark is sure he'll never learn more about his best friend after this giant mess.

entry.title: I am your servant, may I light your cigarette?
entry.summary:
Author: Ana Luz (AnaLuz13)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,714Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: The one that Bruce Wayne has been rescued by Superman and has asked to be taken home. — And if it’s so cold I feel bad just letting you go. You’ve just saved me, you should enter, warm up, rest…The glimmer never leaves his eyes, but, as always, he politely refuses as he remembers him:— I don’t feel cold.— There’s no harm at drinking some tea…Bruce traces Superman’s neck with his fingers, not really looking to his face anymore. He keep trying even though he knows he is always refused. However, he can never stop himself from trying once again.

entry.title: The Agony And The Ecstasy
entry.summary:
Author: Burntbowlofrice

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,846Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Forewarning: I don't know much of canon, it's been a while, and the first chapter is heavy for information and setting instead of development.The Marvel universe is grateful for her heroes saving her the first time, but the trauma she's gathered is too much for her to continue on for much longer. With the last of her power, she detaches some of her heroes from her own self to save them before the collapse of everything they've ever known.Now in Gotham, Tony and Peter salvage together a life, ready to take down enemies and play by this new world's rules for now. But the further into this world they get, the more accepting they are to their situation, and the more friends they find and make along the way.If anyone has any suggestions of what I need to correct, canon, grammar, or punctuation wise, feel free to comment.

entry.title: Superdad, Superbad, Superclone
entry.summary:
Author: clownblood3000

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,844Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 71

Summary: The first clone of Superman was rescued by members of Young Justice: Robin, Kid Flash, and Aqualad. He was given a name, a place, a semblance of family. Conner Kent.A man Clark now views as his brother.But, what if the second clone Lex created wasn’t just another version of Superman? What if the missing DNA sequence was taken from Kara? What if the clone was programmed for mind games, rather than physical confrontation?—In which Clark Kent discovers the newest piece of life-altering news: He has another clone. But this time? The clone sees herself as his daughter.Alternative POVS: Part One- Clark, Dick, and Conner

entry.title: I’ll prove my love to you.
entry.summary:
Author: CertifiedNightwingLover

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,652Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 55

Summary: As their relationship progressed, Clark restarted his touches and lingering stares. He was trying to tell Bruce that he was ready, that he knew that Bruce was genuine, that he was ready for the next step. In his panic, in his fear, in his guilt and his shame, all Bruce had been able to do was play Clark’s advances off, pretend that he didn’t notice, pretend that he didn’t stay up all night stirring in his bed, bracing himself for the inevitable day when Clark stated his needs out loud, leaving Bruce unable to play dumb any longer. Today was that day.

entry.summary:
Author: Panickymouse29

Summary: Amelia is the twin sister of James, she looks exactly like their mother while he looks like their father. The duo were close until they got to Hogwarts and she was sorted into Slytherin, it drove a wedge between the siblings but she never stopped loving her brother. So in their final year she tries to convince him to run away with her and their friends to safety. Will he go?
